channel.title: Chase the Fox Website Updates
channel.description: Up-to-date additions and changes to Chase the Fox's website!

item.title: New Bestiary Entry: Dmuun'dre
item.description: Added a new page to the Bestiary in the World section for the Draconic species, Dmuun'dre.

item.title: New Character: Lily Spellmeyer
item.description: Added a new page to the Character section for Lily Spellmeyer, the little bunny girl who lives next door to Chase.

item.title: New Bestiary Entry: Draklith
item.description: Added a new page to the Bestiary in the World section for the Draconic species, Draklith.

item.title: New Bestiary Entry: Treant
item.description: Added a new page to the Bestiary in the World section for the Floradon species, Treant.

item.title: New Bestiary Entry: Ekzon
item.description: Added a new page to the Bestiary in the World section for the Feral species, Ekzon.

item.title: New Bestiary Entry: Kitsune
item.description: Added a new page to the Bestiary in the World section for the Aspect species, Kitsune.

item.title: New Bestiary Entry: Peskara
item.description: Added a new page to the Bestiary in the World section for the Anthro species, Peskara.

item.title: New Bestiary Entry: Jackawba
item.description: Added a new page to the Bestiary in the World section for the Monster species, Jackawba.

item.title: New Bestiary Entry: Dašungallu
item.description: Added a new page to the Bestiary in the World section for the Draconic species, Dašungallu.

item.title: New Mythology Entry: The Sun and Moon
item.description: Added a new page to Mythology in the World section for the myths of the sun and moon.

item.title: New Bestiary Entry: Draicinne
item.description: Added a new page to the Bestiary in the World section for the Draconic species, Draicinne.
